channel.title: Showcase on Sudhanshu Passi

item.title: What part of your real-estate do people spend most of their time in?
item.description: Learn how to analyze your space usage from standard CCTV footage.

item.description: Generate an image dataset from your favourite fonts.

item.description: Learn how to leverage Random Forests to do Feature Engineering and more.

item.title: Affordable Deep Learning with automated AWS Spot Instances
item.description: The easiest way to get the cheapest Amazon instances for your deep learning projects.

item.description: Learn how to choose the correct architecture for your application.
